overview: From a delicious threesome shot in a bakery, to a romantic love story in winterly New York City, an erotic time travel in search of the secrets of a mysterious photographer, dance and orgasms in a ballet studio. Included: Heidi & The Dough Boys; His Funeral; Objectify Me; Into the Flesh; Underneath Their Nylon Leotards; John & Annie Soulsex.
title: XConfessions 16
